page.title: 16Churches
page.content:
St. Martin's Church of England is one of the four churches in Knebworth. It was designed by Sir Edward Lutyens and built in 1915. The present Rector is the Reverend Roger James. He has been with the church for three years and he takes services during the week. There are three services on Sundays and a morning and evening prayers on weekdays. There is no choir at the moment but they are hoping to start one soon. The Church runs a youth and social club as well as a Sunday School.
The Methodist Church in Knebworth was built in 1965 on the foundations of the previous temporary building. The Church belongs to the circuit of churches which includes the districts of Welwyn Garden City and Stevenage.
